tool_description: Creates detailed implementation timeline with task dependencies, milestones, and critical path analysis for program execution.

program_activities.description: All activities that need to be scheduled

activity_dependencies.description: Activities that must be completed before others can begin

resource_constraints.description: Known limitations that may affect scheduling

milestone_preferences.description: Key milestones to highlight in timeline

error_messages: Insufficient activities: Provide at least 3 program activities to create meaningful timeline.
Invalid start date: Program start date must be a valid future date in ISO 8601 format.
Invalid duration: Program duration must be between 1 and 60 months.
Too many activities: Limit activities to 30 or fewer for manageable timeline.
Circular dependencies: Activity dependencies must not create circular references.
usage: Input program activities, start date, and duration. Optionally specify dependencies, constraints, and milestone preferences. Tool creates comprehensive implementation timeline with critical path analysis.

timeline_schedule.description: Chronological schedule of all program activities

critical_path.description: Activities that determine minimum program duration

key_milestones.description: Important checkpoints and deliverables with dates

buffer_recommendations.description: Suggested time buffers for high-risk activities
